title: Collapse Of The Alliance
opening: Respecting Hector's dying request, Roy made his way west. Intent on reaching Lilina, Roy keeps a steady pace toward Ostia. On his way there, Roy passes through the territory of Laus, governed by Lord Erik. At a glance, Laus is a peaceful territory with vast meadows and clear streams. Beneath this beauty, however, lies treachery and great skullduggery...

intro.speaker: Erik
intro.line: Ah, welcome, Genral Narcian.

intro.speaker: Narcian
intro.line: Lord Erik. I don't think I've yet praised your wisdom in joining Bern.

intro.speaker: Erik
intro.line: Thank you, sire. Ancient vows and traditions are nothing more than a burden anyway.

intro.speaker: Narcian
intro.line: You, my friend, are wise beyond your years. Now, where is that gift you promised me? She does not seem to be here.

intro.speaker: Erik
intro.line: Ah, yes! She is in her quarters. She is exceedingly naive, you see. When I told her she could meet her brother, she cooperated without question. You there! Bring her here!

intro.speaker: Clarine
intro.line: What is this hall? Klein? Where are you, Brother?

intro.speaker: Narcian
intro.line: Welcome, Lady Clarine.

intro.speaker: Clarine
intro.line: Who might you be?

intro.speaker: Narcian
intro.line: I am Narcian, one of Bern's three Wyvern Generals. My lovely little lass, I think you will enjoy my company more than your brother's... Hm hm hm...

intro.speaker: Clarine
intro.line: Heh... Ha ha ha!

intro.speaker: Narcian
intro.line: What? Why do you laugh?

intro.speaker: Clarine
intro.line: You compare yourself to my brother? You think too highly of yourself. Your garb, your hair - even your speech... All a painfully obvious guise to hide your true lowborn face.

intro.speaker: Narcian
intro.line: Lowborn?! Me?! You would compare ME to a peasant?!

intro.speaker: Clarine
intro.line: Oh, heavens no. I would sooner compare you to a filthy, disease-ridden mutt!

intro.speaker: Narcian
intro.line: Y-you vermin!! I'll see you suffer!

intro.speaker: Soldier
intro.line: General Narcian, we just received word that Castle Araphen was retaken by the enemy!

intro.speaker: Narcian
intro.line: What?! Impossible! What of Slater?

intro.speaker: Soldier
intro.line: Err... His whereabouts are unknown, sire. The enemy is reported to be Roy, son of Marquess Pherae.

intro.speaker: Narcian
intro.line: Accursed interruptions! Lord Erik, lock the girl in a cell. I will give her the pleasure of my company when I return! You, blockade the highroad from Ostia. This Roy might just pass by. I want his head!

intro.speaker: Soldier
intro.line: Yes, sire!

battle.speaker: Clarine
battle.line: They will pay dearly for this treatment...

battle.speaker: Unknown Person
battle.line: ...Hey.

battle.speaker: Clarine
battle.line: Who's there?!

battle.speaker: Rutger
battle.line: I'm a mercenary hired by Lord Erik. He wants to see you.

battle.speaker: Clarine
battle.line: I will not. I refuse to meet with such churlish people.

battle.speaker: Rutger
battle.line: ......Just get over here.

battle.speaker: Clarine
battle.line: Let go! You will regret this! Do you have any idea who I am?!

battle.speaker: Clarine
battle.line: Let go, I say!

battle.speaker: Clarine
battle.line: Let go! Let go, I say!

battle.speaker: Rutger
battle.line: Keep it down. You won't be able to make a clean escape making all that noise.

battle.speaker: Clarine
battle.line: Escape?! Then you're...

battle.speaker: Rutger
battle.line: I prepared a horse for you out back under a tree. Take it and go, while everyone's distracted.

battle.speaker: Clarine
battle.line: .......Why are you helping me?

battle.speaker: Rutger
battle.line: I despise Bern with all my soul.

battle.speaker: Clarine
battle.line: With all your soul?

battle.speaker: Rutger
battle.line: ...Never mind. Forget it.

battle.speaker: Clarine
battle.line: Saying that only piques my curiosity further.

battle.speaker: Rutger
battle.line: Time is short. Hurry!

battle.speaker: Clarine
battle.line: I've never met such a boorish man! This is a battlefield! A proper gentleman would escort a lady to her mansion! Well, it's hardly of concern now. Sigh, I only came here to see my brother, and now look at the mess I'm in... What am I to do now?

battle.speaker: Pirate
battle.line: Heh... Foolish nobility. Always involved in some petty dispute. 'Course, you'll hear no complaints from us. Turmoil's how we make a living. Heh heh heh...

battle.speaker: Erik
battle.line: Ah, there you are!

battle.speaker: Rutger
battle.line: What do you want?

battle.speaker: Erik
battle.line: We need some backup. Take some troops and prepare for battle.

battle.speaker: Erik
battle.line: Are you deaf? Go and fight!

battle.speaker: Rutger
battle.line: I heard you. I'll leave when I'm ready.

battle.speaker: Erik
battle.line: Tsk. Not the amiable sort, is he? If his sword arm is as skilled as the rumors say, though, then it's no matter.

recruit-talk.speaker: Clarine
recruit-talk.line: Pardon me, you there!

recruit-talk.speaker: Roy
recruit-talk.line: Me?

recruit-talk.speaker: Clarine
recruit-talk.line: Do you see anyone else? You are the leader of this little group, are you not?

recruit-talk.speaker: Roy
recruit-talk.line: I am.

recruit-talk.speaker: Clarine
recruit-talk.line: Most convenient. Very well then. You will protect me.

recruit-talk.speaker: Roy
recruit-talk.line: Excuse me?

recruit-talk.speaker: Clarine
recruit-talk.line: Hard of hearing? I said that you are going to protect me from harm.

recruit-talk.speaker: Merlinus
recruit-talk.line: Mind your mouth, young lady!

recruit-talk.speaker: Clarine
recruit-talk.line: Away with you, peasant. I was not addressing you.

recruit-talk.speaker: Merlinus
recruit-talk.line: What?! Who do you think-

recruit-talk.speaker: Roy
recruit-talk.line: Calm yourself, Merlinus... It looks like she's being pursued by the castle's soldiers. That's why she wants us to guard her. Right?

recruit-talk.speaker: Clarine
recruit-talk.line: Um, yes! That is correct...

recruit-talk.speaker: Merlinus
recruit-talk.line: Im...impudent child! We can't simply accept any useless girl into our army!

recruit-talk.speaker: Clarine
recruit-talk.line: You may call me Lady Clarine, peasant. And I am not useless! I can use staves to heal wounded allies.

recruit-talk.speaker: Roy
recruit-talk.line: So you'll help us fight?

recruit-talk.speaker: Clarine
recruit-talk.line: ...If that's what it takes! I suppose I can't simply demand protection without any kind of payment.

recruit-talk.speaker: Roy
recruit-talk.line: Thanks, we appreciate it! Our enemy is Bern, so we need everyone we can get. I'm Roy. Pleased to meet you, Lady Clarine.

recruit-talk.speaker: Clarine
recruit-talk.line: The pleasure is all- Ahem! Let's focus on the issue at hand.

recruit-talk.speaker: Clarine
recruit-talk.line: Oh! It's you...

recruit-talk.speaker: Rutger
recruit-talk.line: What? You're still here?

recruit-talk.speaker: Clarine
recruit-talk.line: "Still here?" You abandoned me in the middle of a battlefield! How can you have the nerve to say that?! I could have been killed!

recruit-talk.speaker: Rutger
recruit-talk.line: I guess you're lucky you're still alive then. Did you want something or can I go now?

recruit-talk.speaker: Clarine
recruit-talk.line: Just a moment! I shan't allow you to abandon me twice. A gentleman must take responsibility for his actions.

recruit-talk.speaker: Rutger
recruit-talk.line: Responsibility? For what? I saved you from that twisted sadist.

recruit-talk.speaker: Clarine
recruit-talk.line: If a gentleman rescues a lady, he must also escort her to her mansion! In what fairy tale does some barf of a man abandon his princess?

recruit-talk.speaker: Rutger
recruit-talk.line: ...What in the world are you on about?

recruit-talk.speaker: Clarine
recruit-talk.line: Besides, you said you "despise Bern with all your soul." If you ask me, you'd be better of joining us. We'll be fighting Bern, you know.

recruit-talk.speaker: Rutger
recruit-talk.line: What? Wait! Is that true? Is that army you're in really going to challenge Bern?

recruit-talk.speaker: Clarine
recruit-talk.line: Yes... Our leader, Floyd or whatever his name is, told me himself.

recruit-talk.speaker: Clarine
recruit-talk.line: Yes?

recruit-talk.speaker: Rutger
recruit-talk.line: I'll join your army. Satisfied?

recruit-talk.speaker: Clarine
recruit-talk.line: Ah... I suppose.

recruit-talk.speaker: Clarine
recruit-talk.line: Wait! My protection is more important than fighting Bern! Come back!

visit.speaker: Village
visit.line: If you don't have a thief, you won't be able to open chests and doors. Only a thief can use lockpicks. But I have a key called the door key, which can open any door if anyone uses it. You should thank me.

visit.speaker: Village
visit.line: Everyone here is your ally. We're not about to abandon the land in which we were born in and change sides. Please take this treasured sword. It was given to us generations ago. A gift from the king.

visit.speaker: Village
visit.line: I can't believe this war is happening... Under Bern's leadership, we will definitely wither. Here is something that will help you stand longer. Think carefully before using it.

visit.speaker: House
visit.line: The mountain bandits and pirates attack towns. Once they destroy a town, there won't be anything left. Save the towns!

visit.speaker: House
visit.line: In the Laus army, there are mounted soldiers who use bows. This is the nomad tribe. Everyone wants their military might nowadays...

visit.speaker: House
visit.line: Do you know the main point of combat? There are weapons known as Buster weapons, which defy the weapon triangle!

boss.speaker: Erik
boss.line: You fools are bound down by moldy, old tradition! Allow me to teach you the way of the world!

boss.speaker: Erik
boss.line: Ha...ha ha... Fools... There is no future for...those...who oppose...absolute power...

end.speaker: Merlinus
end.line: Lord Roy! The remaining soldiers from Laus are retreating.

end.speaker: Roy
end.line: Thank you. Tell everyone to get some rest.

end.speaker: Roy
end.line: I never would have thought Lord Erik would turn on Lycia. I thought the Lycian League's bond was stronger than this. Cowardly Bern! Underhanded tactics!

end.speaker: Roy
end.line: Oh... I'm sorry. I wasn't even thinking about you.

end.speaker: Roy
end.line: We'll now proceed west towards Ostia. But now we know that even the other marquesses can't be trusted. With Lord Hector gone, I fear there may be no peaceful end for this war. Princess, do you plan on returning to Bern? If you need anything-

end.speaker: Guinevere
end.line: No, please allow me to stay, if it would not be a burden.

end.speaker: Roy
end.line: You, a burden? Never! But why do you wish to stay?

end.speaker: Guinevere
end.line: My brother is wrong. He is pulling the dragons into a human war. If he thinks this is how he can free the world, I must stop him.

end.speaker: Guinevere
end.line: Yes, he has always been obsessed with "liberating the world." He said that's the purpose of this war.

end.speaker: Guinevere
end.line: I do not know... My brother is not so power-hungry that he would attempt to conquer the world. I'm sure he believes strongly in what he's done to Elibe. Regardless, that doesn't excuse the violence he has caused...
